name: Tardigradius
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a tardigrade? Have you ever wanted to be in space?

Have you ever wanted to do both of those things at the same time? (I know)

Enter Tardigradius. You can now pilot (or possess, whatever) a projectile firing tardigrade against enemy bacteria, viruses and other tiny things that may be a threat to a tardigrade. Probably not in space though, because nothing can survive in space. Except a tardigrade! Sort of.

IN DEVELOPMENT

This game is currently in an early stage of development. Feel free to leave any feedback!

Controls:

 - Movement: WASD

 - Fire: J
